full_text: >>> [b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @gmail.com> 7/26/2019 9:50 AM >>> Mr [b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Is Mr. Epstein approved to receive a CPAP machine? If so, should we send it directly to him through the inmate mail system? Please confirm. Thank you. [b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Page 15912 DOJ-OGR-00024012

text_blocks.content: Is Mr. Epstein approved to receive a CPAP machine? If so, should we send it directly to him through the inmate mail system? Please confirm.

additional_notes: The document contains redactions, indicated by [b)(6), (b)(7)(C)]. The content is an email discussing whether Mr. Epstein is approved to receive a CPAP machine.
